data.message: Hey @eminem i love you thanks for helping me though all the hardest times of my life your music means the world to me you are the only one who i can truly relate to next to my mum we have been through thinks very simular and every time i see you or hear you i want to keep going thank you so much reasently my parent (aint gonna make names ) overdosed i thought of you and what you had to go though and that survival was possible your an inspiration to me and always will be i love you ❤❤❤❤
